Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: This place is amazing! The owner makes fresh pasta on the spot for your order and it wont disappoint you! The plate is generous and the taste fabulous. We also tasted the pastries and also that was absolutely brilliant. Very friendly staff, cozy and welcoming atmosphere. You will feel like you are in Italy!

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: Amazing experience. Food was great and the service was very warm. The chef makes all his best to every dish. He makes new pasta for every order so pasta is very fresh and chewy! Sauce is also fantastic. It‚Äôs little cozy restaurant so you ‚Ä¶

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text:

We ordered:
Two Cappuccinos ‚Ä¶

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: Went here after our other choices were all booked up and boy are we glad we came here. The food was truly amazing and the staff was so attentive. If you‚Äôre looking for good Italian food in Amsterdam then look no further. We both ordered ‚Ä¶

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: This place is awesome.  My friends and I were walking around aimlessly and happened to run into this place.  They were closing for the day, but welcomed us with open arms.  The family and food were amazing.  I would recommend Quattro Gatti to anyone.  Hands down one of my favorite places to eat in Europe.

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text:
Chef Milos is really an artist.
He carefully picks and prepares the right ingredients for an amazing palate experience. ‚Ä¶

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: Well, I just loved this little restaurant! We almost stayed in our hotel for food but so glad we ventured out. Friendly staff, cosy, very good food (good portions!) and great music in the background. If quiet, please do not just walk by. Go ‚Ä¶

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: Very, very bad customer service. Bought 2 doughnuts. Man that works there made mistake with my order, which happens, but when I returned the doughnuts, he was realy rude acting like he is doing me a favour. And then he the thrown bag on the ‚Ä¶

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: An hidden gem in the heart of Amsterdam ! Those kind of spontaneous  evening starting with a glass of wine, followed by delicious Italian cheese and ending with a pastry tasting ! Special bravo to the Chef and his waitress wearing their hearts on their sleeves !

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text:
One man show by chef Milos!
He does all on his own,he cooks great traditional Italian food,takes care of the orders,serves dinner, an admirable man! No wonder his food tastes amazing!

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: For a long time already our favourite Italian. Come here twice a year and the food is fantastic always. Milos is a dedicated chef with his hart in the kitchen.

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: Chef Milos is amazing. The beauty of Italian food is the simplicity and freshness of ingredients, and that's what shines at Quattro Gatti. But it goes hand in hand with a love for people and the desire to create a warm space for this ‚Ä¶

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: The best and the tastiest authentic Italian desert, yammy! üòçü§§ If you wanna go to Italy without traveling, this is the place üëåüëå And the guy from the restaurant was sooo welcoming, I would definetly go there again and I do recommend to try the Italian autentic taste there ü§©üçùü•ß‚òï

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: Love the place!!! Food is really good and the owner is super nice and he make fresh pasta for your order!!!

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: Stopped here spontaneously while exploring the area for some delicious Italian pasta. The carbonara was excellent - simple and the flavor was so well done. 10/10 would recommend.

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: The food was amazing!   There was just one guy cooking and one waitress in this tiny cafe and it was phenomenal!  Favorite meal in Amsterdam.

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: I have never felt the urge to leave a review, but this was one of the better italian food experiences ever. ‚Ä¶

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: We wanted to order coffee, but we were told that we can‚Äôt get any, since it‚Äôs dinner time and they are serving only dinner. Ok,  no problem. Asked if I could at least use the restroom and I was told no, since it‚Äôs only for the customers. How can I be a customer if they don‚Äôt want me to? No logic found.

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text:
We have got different type of pastries and they were all amazing, we couldn‚Äôt stop eating them. We are Italians living in Amsterdam and we were looking for something typical and Quattro Gatti exceeded our expectations. We will order again very soon :)
Carola & Edo

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: The true taste of Italy in the heart of Amsterdam! The pastries are amazing (in particular the pastiera di Pasqua - only at Easter, too bad if you've missed it). ‚Ä¶

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: Fresh and authentic ingredients, real deal of Italian pastry in Amsterdam! The cannoli siciliani were to die for. Fair prices and kind staff, recommended! I'm curious to try out the restaurant too, so I'll be back.

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: Excellent patisserie, very high quality and very fresh. The owner is very friendly and very kind. I highly recommend. We go there almost once a week!

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: An authentic Italian corner in the center of Amsterdam, here you will find any kind of delicious Italian homemade desserts and focaccia. Very recommended if you want to try real Italian food. The owner is very kind and nice.

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text:
This was, without a doubt, the best restaurant experience I have ever had.

The server, Claudia, was amazing. She was the only one serving the 8-10 tables ‚Ä¶

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: Great authentic food. Get the pasta with truffle if they have it.

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: If i can give it 10 stars i would. Some of the most authentic and great Italian food ive ever tasted and I'm quite experienced in Italian cuisine. The place itself is very cozy and their hostess is just so welcoming and created a great vibe. Highly recommended! You'll love it!

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: Lovely owner and very welcoming atmosphere when coming in. Had a great pastry (maritozzo) and an espresso for not even 4‚Ç¨. Would highly recommend!

Review Text:
Milos is a genius and Claudia is a queen on the service.

This was the second time visiting this restaurant. I have tried over 20 ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Amazing tasteful and cozy. A gem for authentic italian feast in Amsterdam

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: Amazing ravioli and rib eye steak! Loved the service too

Name: Quattro Gatti

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: Awesome chef with home made food and pastry! Recommended!

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text:
What a gem!

We were warmly greeted by the lady of the restaurant and served a delicious ‚Ä¶

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: Delicious authentic food, bursting with flavour you can taste the freshness. Fairly reasonably priced by Amsterdam standards, and set in a gorgeous rustic building. We will definitely be returning for dinner.

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: Possibly the best Italian restaurant in Amsterdam! With ‚ÄúThere is no pizza inside‚Äù sign on its doors, it is a small, cosy place, and all food made by a single chef - Milos. If you come early, you could get a table without reservation. And the food is great!

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: during Corona lock down, you can get coffee to go (Italian prices! the cheapest coffee I have ever had in Amsterdam) and really nice home made pastries.

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: To get pasta is very easy everywhere but it's very  hard to find traditional Italian flavor( if you have tried Italian food in Italy, you will know what I mean), so I think this is best pasta I have ever eaten in Netherlands so far. Small cozy restaurant, feels like you having dinner in Italian friends house.

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text:
Very authentic Italian restaurants are hard to come by, so make sure you visit this one, it's fantastic!!!
Really good Italian home cooked food, the chef has a great touch. Highly recommend it.

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: If only Italian restaurants round the world could copy this example. Simple food with outstanding results, the prawn, scallop & clam tagliatelle was exquisite. Chef is amusing, as are his responses to bad reviews

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: The most delicious linguine vongole I've had outside of Italy. Great location in the 9 Straatjes with intimate setting, friendly service and a chef who clearly is passionate about cooking good food.

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: Came here for my birthday with my husband.  Pasta and tiramisu were great and the owner was very friendly.  We also had a great view :D

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: Ordered a spaghetti pomodoro, which I assumed would be a rather easy dish to get right. It was insultingly bad. On the table next to us the customers complained about their food and were abruptly shut down. Honestly, go else where

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: Simply the best Piedmontese food of Netherland... The Chef is fantastic and does everything by himself. Yes sometimes you'll have to wait a bit but it's definitely worth it.

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: Cozy place, big portions, desserts to die for and very good italian espresso (finally!). Nice people and excellent music to complete the atmosphere üòÉ

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: True, Italian food prepared simply and deliciously.  Small, quaint room reminds me of the chef cooking for me in his own house.

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: Italian couple making authentic Italian food from all over Italy. Excellent taste and original dishes for some of them ! Will be back soon !

Name: Quattro Gatti
Review Text: Amazing food! Really great service and super chill vibe. Did I mention good Italian tunes?
